lines.text: for i = 1 to n , print new line
lines.code: for ( int i = 1 ; i <= n ; i ++ , cout << endl )

lines.text: for j = 0 to star exclusive , print *
lines.code: for ( int j = 0 ; j < star ; j ++ ) cout << " * " ;

lines.text: for j = 0 to ch exclusive , print D
lines.code: for ( int j = 0 ; j < ch ; j ++ ) cout << " D " ;

lines.text: for j = 0 to start exclusive , print *
lines.code: for ( int j = 0 ; j < star ; j ++ ) cout << " * " ;
